overview: Mejika, a pretty Eurasian woman, is hired as a biology teacher at a renowned high school.  She is reputed for her iron discipline. But the extremely provocative attitude of Mejika ends up worrying the school's administration. The young woman then sows trouble by revealing the cases of vice and corruption that are legion in this school...
tagline: Call a terrible spring storm and the female deer will run!
title: Teacher Deer
